channel.title: CVE Feed for geekman -- all

item.title: CVE-2017-12087|2024-08-05T18:28:16.485Z -- geekman -- tinysvcmdns
item.description: An exploitable heap overflow vulnerability exists in the tinysvcmdns library version 2016-07-18. A specially crafted packet can make the library overwrite an arbitrary amount of data on the heap with attacker controlled values. An attacker needs send a dns packet to trigger this vulnerability.
